#Which Function
X<-c(2,4,7,9)
which(X==4)
which.max(X)
which.min(X)
#Matrix
matrix(1:6,nrow=2)
matrix(1:6,ncol=2)
m<-matrix(1:6,nrow=2,byrow=TRUE)
m
rbind(1:2,1:2)
cbind(1:3,1:3)
Naming a Matrix
colnames(m)<-c("col1","col2","col3")
m
rownames(m)<-c("row1","row2")
m
#Lists

list_data
#Naming a List
names(list_data)<-list("col1","col2","col3","col4")
list_data
